summary:
VSL Token - The crypto token generated for "Vietnam Smarthub Logistics" (VSL) - Supper Application.

 ABOUT VIETNAMHUB.VN - The crypto token generated for "Vietnam Smarthub Logistics" (VSL) - Supper Application.

 KEY FEATURES - HIGH SPEED AND LOW COSTS

Smart contracts autonomously perform funding – collect and release payments

FAIR DEALS ONLY

Open-source smart contract ensures fair and transparent deals

PROTECTION FROM HACKING

If one account is hacked, this won’t breach the security

COST EFFECTIVE

Scale economy through decentralization leading to significant decrease in transaction fees

NO MORE MIDDLE MEN

Immediate funding without third-parties.

EASY ENTRY AND FAIR COMPETITION

Open-source smart contract ensures fair and transparent deals

GLOBAL P2P TRADE FINANCING

On a decentralized platform, all user accounts are independent

REAL-TIME DATABASE

Scale economy through decentralization leading to significant decrease in transaction fees

 VSL TOKENOMICS - DISTRIBUTION

VSL TOKENOMICS

FOUNDER: 19%

DEVELOPERS: 4.5%

PARTNERS & ADVISERS: 4.5%

EARLY INVESTORS: 11%

PUBLIC SALE: 21%

TREASURY: 20%

CONTRIBUTOR REWARDS: 5%

AIRDROPS: 1.2%

FUTURE HIRES: 2.8%

MARKET MAKERS: 11%

DISTRIBUTION

TOTAL SUPPLY : 100,000,000 VSL

DISTRIBUTION TIME : 10 YEARS

LISTING PRICE : $0.76

INITIAL MARKET CAP : $13,000,000

***Burning of VSL to reduce supply:** Every 06 months, VSL will utilize 0-5%
of the revenue generated based on the trading volume on our crypto-to-crypto
platform to burn VSL tokens. The foundation may decide to adjust these numbers
in the future if necessary.

Pay a dividend of 5.5% every 6 months.

 ICO VSL Token - ICO Tokens Details & Sale Tokens.

Start

May 8, 2022 (9:00AM GMT)

End

Dec 31, 2024 (9:00AM GMT)

Acceptable curencies

ETH, BTC, BNB

Number of Tokens for Sale

7.000.000 Tokens

Minimal Transaction

2.000 Tokens / Transaction

 ROADMAP - We are absolutely dedicated to meet our development goals ahead of schedule
and provide the ultimate framework and feature support for VSL Tokens.
